text: Not only a great investment in your health, but also as a gift for loved ones. Jan proved to be excellent and helped with my dad's ailments :)

Very good specialist. The visit took place in a friendly atmosphere. Everything was discussed and explained in detail. I also received guidance on what and how to do to prevent such problems that I came with in the future.
Effective visit, Jan knows his job well. I recommend
Rehabilitation after a fracture. After the first visit, I felt an improvement in the mobility of the injured limb. I recommend this doctor and the office.

A detailed interview was conducted, full professionalism and exhaustive answers to the questions asked :) and the massage performed by Jan made me get rid of the pain and tension I came with. I wholeheartedly recommend!
Full professionalism, everything explained in detail, I highly recommend

Great specialist, concrete and professional approach to the client. Quickly diagnosed the problem and using the right tools got rid of it within an hour, while answering various questions and giving recommendations regarding future prevention. Additionally, a big plus is the very good contact with the patient, the visit took place in a pleasant atmosphere without losing quality. I recommend!

Well-conducted interview and diagnosis of the problem. Additionally, a massage that brought immediate effect - relief from pain. I received a wealth of knowledge and exercises that I can do myself and monitor progress. I recommend.
Massage performed professionally and with attention to detail. The physiotherapist showed a good approach and adapted the treatment to my needs.

I am a regular patient of Anna and I can say with full conviction that she is one of the most professional and dedicated specialists I have ever dealt with. Anna combines vast knowledge with exceptional empathy and an individual approach to the patient. She always listens carefully, accurately diagnoses, and adapts therapy to the health condition. Thanks to her help, my headaches and dizziness, which previously made daily functioning very difficult, have significantly decreased. I value her not only for her effectiveness but also for her warmth and great sense of humor, which makes even the more difficult moments during therapy pass more easily. I wholeheartedly recommend!

I have been going to Anna for physiotherapy for 3 years now. She is a physiotherapist with great knowledge and commitment, in her office you can relax in a pleasant atmosphere and even talk and laugh. I have used the help of various physiotherapists but only here for the first time I encountered such commitment and knowledge. Anna helped me when I had sciatica and even steroid injections did not help me. After a series of treatments, she got me back on my feet and I could walk and function normally without pain. Often when I have migraines or shoulder pain, I come for rehabilitation because I know she will always help me and I will feel better and be healthy.
I am writing this review with disappointment and a sense of duty to warn others.
Nice, professional, explained everything thoroughly, I recommend
Concrete approach to the patient, everything explained in detail
Anna Kowalska is a reliable and concrete specialist. She accurately diagnosed the problem and recommended further steps. I highly recommend and will return in case of problems :)
Concrete, substantive explanation of the problem. Clear guidelines for further action.

I have been to many physiotherapists, but no one so accurately identified the cause of my pain complaints. Anna approaches the patient individually, including consulting whether the conversation during the visit does not bother the patient.
The engagement during visits is not uniform, sometimes less, sometimes more. If someone likes to talk a lot, this is the place for them. The lady is very nice, though sometimes overwhelming.

Anna is an extremely nice and empathetic person, a professional through and through. The visits take place in a pleasant, friendly atmosphere and bring extraordinary effects. Anna conducts an interview and looks at the patient holistically. The treatments already after the first visit brought a clear improvement in my functioning, I also received advice and exercises for home. I highly recommend visits to Anna :)
Very nice physiotherapist. You can see that they know what they are talking about and that they like their job and want to help the patient.
